entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries this morning and 40 percent chance of rain showers this afternoon. Wind east 20 km/h. High 6. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MST Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers changing to 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 3. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MST Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 1. POP 40%
